components.content:
In this section, we'll ask you to:

  • confirm your emerging local plan will be at Regulation 19 stage on 12 March 2025
  • confirm your new local housing need figure will be 25% or more greater than the housing requirement in your emerging local plan
  • agree to revise your plan to reflect the revised NPPF (National Planning Policy Framework) and new LHN (local housing need) prior to submitting the document for examination
  • confirm you anticipate submitting your plan in the current system (by June or December 2026)
  • agree to collaborate with MHCLG over monitoring and evaluation requirements
  • confirm your section 151 officer, or deputy section 151 officer, is aware of this submission
